item.title: Batman Iphone Background [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @I_Java_I I Java I
item.description:
@I_Java_I wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:450663”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=553547.msg4055517#msg4055517 date=1342901595]

if you don’t want to accept any criticism then why are you posting this

Im not rejecting any criticism Im just stating your argument against my “pink” swirls is invalid because its purple. Im remaking one any ways with glowing eyes so Ill be sure to put a different color on the swirl just for you.
[/quote]
I don’t give a shit if it’s pink or purple, you’re rejecting the rest of the criticism for that one point. So I saw the fucking color wrong, oh well. The point is that it’s unfitting with batman. Yellow would be fitting, because the batman logo is yellow, which would be more relevant. But the design itself doesn’t fit with batman. It would be like me putting rainbow vectors on Slenderman.[/quote]
First of all that would be HILARIOUS (the Slenderman thing.) Also why does everyone seem to be an asshole towards you?

Read full topic

item.title: Batman Iphone Background [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:1, topic:450663”]Well I got a cool render and missed using the effect. So I threw this together In a few minutes. Thought someone might want for their iPhone background since the new movie is out. Also I feel bad for the massacre in the theater so please kinda too soon for jokes about it.

Ideas on improvement? Also making backgrounds for fun so let me know if you want one witha certain effect/theme.[/quote]
can u make me a background for my xat? just make it good with the word TRISIDIAX where it shows your messages(:
